channel.title: Comments on: How Not To Learn Your Lesson

item.title: By: Robert Scoble
item.dc:creator: Robert Scoble
item.description:
...as long as they get my URL right. Heh!
But, yeah, I wanted to shake things up a bit and wanted to point out that Mac heads still haven't given us credit for what we've shipped, so don't expect them to give us any credit for anything new we come up with either.
item.content:encoded:
…as long as they get my URL right. Heh!

But, yeah, I wanted to shake things up a bit and wanted to point out that Mac heads still haven’t given us credit for what we’ve shipped, so don’t expect them to give us any credit for anything new we come up with either.
